title: Still no answer, so thought i would try again
body:
Hi there,

For about the last week-week and a half i've been having 15-20 second 'attempting to reconnect' in game and its happening about every 1-3 mins.
Although i still have an internet connection and no other programs are suffering from this issue.
What makes it even more annoying is while i'm 'connected' and playing the game my internet is perfect, no lag at all and everything is working well. then just BAM ' attempting to reconnect' for about 15-20 seconds and then the game goes back to being perfect with no lag once again. Although my team mates have been telling me that i'm not 'disconnecting from the game' on their end - i'm just kind of standing there even though on my screen i'm 'attempting to reconnect.'

I've never had this issue before in the 3-4 years i've been playing and i've even been playing on the same PC this whole time.

Its very strange and frustrating as its unplayable as that 15-20 second 'disconnect' is more then enough time to get my killed.

Please advice what action is to be taken to resolve this issue.

Cheers,

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text and reply back with them here (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this)
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and email a link to your results to oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com, remember to include a link to your thread in the email.
